original_text: none of the men who have seen my glory and my signs that I did in Egypt and in the wilderness, and yet have put me to the test these ten times and have not obeyed my voice,
korean_text: 내 영광과 애굽과 광야에서 행한 내 이적을 보고서도 이같이 열 번이나 나를 시험하고 내 목소리를 청종하지 아니한 그 사람들은

sentences.original_text: none of the men who have seen my glory
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 영광을 본 사람들 중에 아무도 없으니

sentences.original_text: and my signs that I did in Egypt
and yet have put me to the test
and have not obeyed my voice
